text: Level 42 is a Pop band from the United Kingdom. They were formed in 1979 on the Isle of Wight. Their songs include Something About You (1985) and "Lessons in Love" (1986). The current Level 42 is formation have Mark King, Mike Lindup, Pete Ray Biggin and Nathan King. title: Level 42
